New-York Historical Society collection of New York City miscellaneous manuscripts

Summons issued to Pieter Van Vranken, John Van Vranken, Johan Cloet and Jacob Van Voorst to give testimony in the case of John and Deborah Sanders and Ryan Schermerhorn, Daniel Fort, Rykert R. Van Vranken and Dirck Van Vranken

Summons issued to Pieter Van Vranken, John Van Vranken, Johan Cloet and Jacob Van Voorst to give testimony in the case of John and Deborah Sanders and Ryan Schermerhorn, Daniel Fort, Rykert R. Van Vranken and Dirck Van Vranken
Case involved Trespass and ejection; signed by George Clarke, Secretary of State and Peter Silvester, Attorney
